string.value: #bYoona#k is in a bit of trouble after wandering out of Amherst.

Yoona is trapped by monsters between her and Amherst. To help her return home, she needs you to take care of some#rBlue Snails#k and #rShrooms#k.

Blue Snail #r#a10391##k 
Shroom #r#a10392##k
You took care of the Blue Snails and Shrooms and told Yoona.
Ahhhh! What can I do?! Someone help me! Hey, aren't you a new traveler? Can you...hunt #rBlue Snails#k and #rSpores#k by any chance?

I heard Maria was going to pick some mushrooms, so I headed out of town to find her, only to be surrounded by monsters! Please! Take care of #r10 Blue Snails#k and #r10 Spores#k for me! Pretty please!
Nooooo! What can I do, then? How else can I get home safely?
Wow! You cleared out the Blue Snails and Spores! That's amazing! Thank you! Now I can safely walk home.
If you're looking for Amherst, head west. If you're looking for Southperry, it's southeast of here.
I don't think you have defeated all the #rBlue Snails#k and #rSpores#k yet. Please hunt #r10 of each#k for me!
